attributes.action: Call for a ban on the appleby horse fair
attributes.background: Over the past three years, Appleby horse fair has developed from a celebration of the gypsy traveling community, in to a festival in which a beautiful local town looses all sense of control and resigns to the laws of travellers.

rejection.details:
The UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the Appleby Horse Fair. 

There is a Multi-Agency Strategic Co-ordinating Group (MASCG) which brings together various local agencies, including loca councils and police. 

You can find out more here: http://www.applebyfair.org/sites/default/files/attachments/ApplebyFairStrategy2018.pdf

You could raise your issue with a local councillor. You can use this page to find out who the local councillors are, and how to contact them:
https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
